cryo_chamber.name: Cryo Chamber
cryo_chamber.description: Frost clings to the walls. Your cryo-pod is open. A single light flickers above.

hallway.name: Main Hallway
hallway.description: Dim emergency lights guide your way. The silence is loud.

lab.name: Research Lab
lab.description: Broken vials and smashed terminals. Something went wrong here.

bridge.name: Bridge
bridge.description: The control center. Most systems are offline. A locked terminal blinks faintly.

armory.name: Armory
armory.description: Racks of missing weapons. A security console glows red.

medbay.name: MedBay
medbay.description: Dark and blood-stained. Medical robots lie motionless.

bio_lab.name: Bio Lab
bio_lab.description: Plant samples have overgrown their containers. The air feels humid.

containment.name: Containment Zone
containment.description: Thick blast doors guard whatever lies beyond. A warning screen blinks 'QUARANTINE'.

storage_bay.name: Storage Bay
storage_bay.description: Stacked crates and malfunctioning drones. Something scurries in the dark.

maintenance.name: Maintenance Access
maintenance.description: Pipes leak steam. Panels are torn open. This place is falling apart.

vent_shafts.name: Ventilation Shafts
vent_shafts.description: Narrow and claustrophobic. You can barely move. Strange sounds echo.

escape_pod.name: Escape Pod Bay
escape_pod.description: All pods are gone... except one. The door is jammed.

observation_deck.name: Observation Deck
observation_deck.description: A vast window shows stars swirling in silence. You feel watched.

server_room.name: Server Room
server_room.description: A hum of dying circuits. Data cores flicker in and out.

engineering_bay.name: Engineering Bay
engineering_bay.description: Sparks fly from damaged engines. It's too hot to stay long.

crew_quarters.name: Crew Quarters
crew_quarters.description: Bunks are unmade. Personal items still linger. Everyone left in a hurry.

command_room.name: Command Room
command_room.description: A central table displays a static-filled hologram of the system.

janitor_closet.name: Janitor's Closet
janitor_closet.description: Dusty and cramped. Strange scribbles cover the walls.

cargo_hold.name: Cargo Hold
cargo_hold.description: Endless crates and tangled nets. One crate is broken open.

airlock.name: Airlock
airlock.description: Exterior suit rack is empty. Warning lights flash intermittently.
